Variable Definition: a factor denoting the watershed where the sample was collected
a factor denoting the elevation of the transect
Allowable Values/Parameters: Low = low elevation, Mid = mid elevation

Variable Definition: a factor denoting the transect number within the watershed
a factor denoting the sample number within the transect
Notes: There are twenty samples in each transect

Variable Definition: the height of the seedling in millimeters
Allowable Values/Parameters: Positive values with one decimal place

Variable Definition: the area of the first sampled leaf in square centimeters
Allowable Values/Parameters: Positive values with three decimal places

Variable Definition: the area of the second sampled leaf in square centimeters
Allowable Values/Parameters: Positive values with three decimal places

Variable Definition: the dry mass of both sampled leaves in grams
Allowable Values/Parameters: Positive values with four decimal places

Variable Definition: the dry mass of the stem in grams
Allowable Values/Parameters: Positive values with four decimal places

Variable Definition: the area of both leaves in addition to the area removed for chlorophyll measurements in square centimeters
Allowable Values/Parameters: Positive values with three decimal places
